issue.title: automatically locate gazebo resources in deploy step

content.raw:
It works for most users, but others can install gazebo from source, which lets you install into custom install path. So we need a way to identify the user's install path and source the gazebo setup file in that directory.

One possible way to do this could be do run the command `which gazebo` and extract the install prefix
content.html:
It works for most users, but others can install gazebo from source, which lets you install into custom install path. So we need a way to identify the user's install path and source the gazebo setup file in that directory.

One possible way to do this could be do run the command which gazebo and extract the install prefix
